sentences.sentence: Most known extrasolar planets reside in highly elongated, not circular, orbits.
sentences.translation: 大多数已知的太阳系外行星都居住在高度拉长而非圆形的轨道上。

sentences.sentence: It will also help with the search for extrasolar planets.
sentences.translation: 它还能帮助寻找太阳系以外的行星。

sentences.sentence: Time to start giving extrasolar planets proper names
sentences.translation: 该替太阳系之外的行星适当取名了
